name: Cactus Gear Solid
description:
Story (half in portuguese, half in english):

Geraldo é um coala que foi sequestrado de sua terra natal por um grupo de bio terrorista. Entretanto seu navio naufragou perto da costa de um deserto e agora Geraldo deve explorar essa nova terra atrás de alimento. For this, our young koala must use an arsenal of stealth skills and items to dodge the hostile cactus in the region to reach it's goal, the new food.

Controls:
  • Arrow Keys : Moves your character
  • Q : Use item
Credits:
  • 3D Moleder - Gustavo Sasaki Roncaglia
  • prosthetic makeup effects designer - Gustavo Sasaki Roncaglia
  • わたし - Gustavo Sasaki Roncaglia
  • Entusiasta de IA que não sabe recursão - Translation(en-CA): AI enthusiast who doesn’t know recursion - Igor Lovatto Resende
  • Dev who doesn't know shit about Vectors - Marcelo T. Castro
  • Fisioterapeuta de boneco digital - Physical Therapy of digital action figures - L. Mateus Martins Araújo e C.
  • Frustated musician who got into CompSci because of money - Miguel de Mattos Gardini
    • (Ps: No, it's not a joke, I'm really crying for help here)
